verses.text: \w This|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w concerning|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w drought|strong="H1226"\w*:

“\w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* mourns \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w her|strong="H8179"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* languish. \w Her|strong="H8179"\w* people wail \w for|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H6682"\w* \w goes|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* nobles \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w servants|strong="H6810"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cisterns|strong="H1356"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w jars|strong="H3627"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w are|strong="H4325"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w humiliated|strong="H3637"\w*; \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w cover|strong="H2645"\w* \w their|strong="H7725"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* ground \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w cracked|strong="H2865"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w fallen|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* farmers \w are|strong="H1961"\w* ashamed; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w cover|strong="H2645"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w Wild|strong="H6501"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H6501"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* barren \w heights|strong="H8205"\w*; \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w pant|strong="H7602"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w air|strong="H7307"\w* \w like|strong="H7307"\w* \w jackals|strong="H8577"\w*; \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* lack \w of|strong="H7307"\w* pasture.”

\w Although|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w act|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sake|strong="H4616"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* rebellions \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7231"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hope|strong="H4723"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w its|strong="H1961"\w* \w Savior|strong="H3467"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w times|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w distress|strong="H6869"\w*, \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* land, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* traveler \w who|strong="H1616"\w* stays \w but|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w night|strong="H3885"\w*?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1368"\w* \w taken|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* surprise, \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w warrior|strong="H1368"\w* powerless \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w*? \w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* forsake \w us|strong="H5921"\w*!

\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w about|strong="H3541"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: “Truly \w they|strong="H3651"\w* love \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w wander|strong="H5128"\w*; \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w restrained|strong="H2820"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*. \w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3541"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w*; \w He|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H6485"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H1157"\w*, “\w Do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* well-being \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w Although|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H2719"\w* \w fast|strong="H6684"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w their|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*; \w although|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H2719"\w* \w offer|strong="H5927"\w* \w burnt|strong="H5930"\w* \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* grain \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w accept|strong="H7521"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w*. \w Instead|strong="H3588"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* \w finish|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w* \w off|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H5927"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w plague|strong="H1698"\w*.”

“Ah, \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*!” \w I|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w Look|strong="H7200"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w are|strong="H5030"\w* telling \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, ‘\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w suffer|strong="H5414"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* lasting \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* \w in|strong="H4725"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.’”

“\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*,” \w replied|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w I|strong="H6680"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w appoint|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*. \w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w prophesying|strong="H5012"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w false|strong="H8267"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w worthless|strong="H3808"\w* \w divination|strong="H7081"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* futility \w and|strong="H3068"\w* delusion \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* own \w minds|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H3541"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w says|strong="H3541"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w I|strong="H3541"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* say, ‘\w No|strong="H3808"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* touch \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land.’ \w By|strong="H5921"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w very|strong="H3651"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w meet|strong="H8552"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w end|strong="H8552"\w*!

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w whom|strong="H1992"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w thrown|strong="H7993"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w streets|strong="H2351"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* wives, \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w speak|strong="H1697"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w them|strong="H3381"\w*: ‘\w My|strong="H3588"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w overflow|strong="H3381"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w*; \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* \w cease|strong="H1820"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w been|strong="H2470"\w* \w shattered|strong="H7665"\w* \w by|strong="H3915"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* crushing \w blow|strong="H4347"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w severely|strong="H2470"\w* \w grievous|strong="H2470"\w* \w wound|strong="H4347"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w country|strong="H7704"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* enter \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H2009"\w* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* ravaged \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* travel \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*.’”

\w Have|strong="H3063"\w* \w You|strong="H5221"\w* \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w completely|strong="H6960"\w*? \w Do|strong="H3063"\w* \w You|strong="H5221"\w* \w despise|strong="H3988"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*? \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H3063"\w* \w You|strong="H5221"\w* \w stricken|strong="H5221"\w* \w us|strong="H5315"\w* so \w that|strong="H5315"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H6726"\w* beyond \w healing|strong="H4832"\w*? \w We|strong="H5315"\w* \w hoped|strong="H6960"\w* \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w has|strong="H3063"\w* \w come|strong="H3063"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w for|strong="H6960"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w of|strong="H6256"\w* \w healing|strong="H4832"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H5315"\w* \w only|strong="H7965"\w* \w terror|strong="H1205"\w*.

\w We|strong="H3588"\w* \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers; \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.
